verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) To Thee, O Lord, <WH3068> I call; <WH7121> My rock, <WH6697> do not be deaf <WH2790> to me, Lest, <WH6435> if Thou be silent <WH2814> to me, I become <WH4911> like <WH4911> those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

Hear <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469> when I cry <WH7768> to Thee for help, <WH7768> When I lift <WH5375> up my hands <WH3027> toward <WH413> Thy holy <WH6944> sanctuary. <WH1687>

Do not drag <WH4900> me away <WH4900> with the wicked <WH7563> And with those who work <WH6466> iniquity; <WH205> Who speak <WH1696> peace <WH7965> with their neighbors, <WH7453> While evil <WH9567> is in their hearts. <WH3824>

Requite <WH5414> them according to their work <WH6467> and according to the evil <WH7455> of their practices; <WH4611> Requite <WH5414> them according to the deeds <WH4639> of their hands; <WH3027> Repay <WH7725> them their recompense. <WH1576>

Because <WH3588> they do not regard <WH995> the works <WH6468> of the Lord <WH3068> Nor <WH3808> the deeds <WH4639> of His hands, <WH3027> He will tear <WH2040> them down <WH2040> and not build <WH1129> them up.
Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord, <WH3068> Because <WH3588> He has heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplication. <WH8469>

The Lord <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my shield; <WH4043> My heart <WH3820> trusts <WH982> in Him, and I am helped; <WH5826> Therefore my heart <WH3820> exults, <WH5937> And with my song <WH7892> I shall thank <WH3034> Him.
The Lord <WH3068> is their strength, <WH5797> And He is a saving <WH3444> defense <WH4581> to His anointed. <WH4899>
Save <WH3467> Thy people, <WH5971> and bless <WH1288> Thine inheritance; <WH5159> Be their shepherd <WH7462> also, and carry <WH5375> them forever. <WH5704> <WH5769>
